ingredients: 10 ounces chicken tenderloins, sliced into strips
instructions: Mix garlic powder, chili powder, paprika, and basil in a large bowl.
; stir to coat with garlic powder mixture.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken, onion, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink and vegetables are tender, 7 to 10 minutes.
title: Easy Chicken and Bell Pepper Fajitas
steps: Mix garlic powder, chili powder, paprika, and basil in a large bowl. Add chicken strips; stir to coat with garlic powder mixture.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken, onion, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink and vegetables are tender, 7 to 10 minutes.
